name: Sourcewater Droplet
description:
After Neuvillette uses a Normal Attack: Heals Neuvillette for 2 HP. If Neuvillette is your active character, then Prepare Skill: Equitable Judgment.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)
